Activity: Final day! Coffee, emails, and a look back at the week's accomplishments. Feeling good!
Focus on polishing the level based on feedback from yesterday's demo. Address any remaining issues with gameplay, visuals, or technical performance.
Final playtest of the level. Focus on the overall player experience, ensuring a smooth and engaging gameplay loop from start to finish. Look for opportunities to fine-tune the pacing.
Prepare a final build of the level for QA testing. Include clear instructions on how to access the level and what areas to focus on during testing. Send it to @Qtest-1.
Lunch. Celebrate the end of the week with the team!
Document all changes made to the level during the week. Create a detailed change log for future reference. This is crucial for version control.
Write a brief summary of the week's accomplishments and challenges for @Ldes-1. Include suggestions for improving the level design process in the future. Be constructive!
Catch up on any outstanding emails or administrative tasks. Wrap up any loose ends before the weekend.
Properly shut down the system. Head home and enjoy the weekend. Time to recharge and get ready for next week's challenges.
